item.description:
♫♫ WEDNESDAY NOV 24 – Connecticut’s Premiere Jimi Hendrix Tribute with The CT Party Club

On Thanksgiving Eve, Wednesday November 24, the CT Party Club presents Connecticut’s Premier Jimi Hendrix Tribute Band - Bold As Love. Local Guitar Hero Sal Iacobucci and the rest of Bold As Love faithfully recreate the blues-fueled skill and musical genius of the legendary Jimi Hendrix.

Hendrix blazed a burning trail in Rock and Roll -and is an influence to every Guitar Hero on the scene today. Jimi’s legacy will live on forever, and Bold As Love brings you the Jimi Hendrix Experience the way it was meant to sound.

Don’t miss this special evening of Rock and Roll from the Legendary Hendrix library

Tickets are $15 at the door

ADVANCE DISCOUNT TICKETS - $10 only at http://www.CTPartyClu...

CUGINOS Italian Restaurant
1410 Highland Ave (Route 10)
Cheshire, CT 06410

Exit 3 off 691

Doors open at 9pm


Get your ticket today at http://www.CTPartyClu... or call
860.FUN.5151
( 860.386.5151)
